bibl.title: Letter from Henry Rose Carter to Frederick F. Russell, April 9, 1923

div1.p: Carter sends Russell his comments on Connor's paper about the biology of the mosquito vector.

div1.head: Letter from Henry Rose Carter to Frederick F. Russell, April 9, 1923
div1.opener:
I. H. B.
Connor's paper
/LC
2121 California St., N. W.,
Washington, D. C.,
April 9, 1923.
Dr. F. F. Russell,
General Director,
International Health Board,
61 Broadway,
New York, N. Y.
Dear Doctor Russell:
div1.p:
I am enclosing a paper of Dr. Connor's, given me by Dr. White
with a request for suggestions in such parts of it as are concerned
with the biology of the mosquito vector.

These are contained in the attached Memorandum numbered to cor-
respond with similar numbers on the margin of the MSS in question.
